name: TurboScribe
description: TurboScribe is an AI-powered platform that transcribes audio and video files into accurate text with support for over 98 languages.
longDescription: TurboScribe is an advanced AI transcription service designed to convert audio and video files into precise, editable text with 99.8% accuracy, powered by Whisper AI technology. It caters to professionals such as journalists, podcasters, researchers, and educators by streamlining workflows and enhancing content accessibility. The platform supports unlimited transcriptions for subscribers, with no caps on usage, making it ideal for high-volume transcription needs. TurboScribe also offers translation into over 134 languages and speaker recognition to distinguish voices in multi-speaker settings. Its user-friendly interface and robust export options (e.g., PDF, DOCX, SRT) make it versatile for various industries, from media to education. Data privacy is prioritized, with encrypted uploads and user-controlled file deletion.
features: High-accuracy transcription converts audio and video to text with 99.8% precision, minimizing manual corrections.
Speaker recognition identifies and labels different speakers, enhancing clarity for interviews, podcasts, and meetings.
Supports over 98 languages, enabling transcription for a global audience with diverse linguistic needs.
Unlimited transcriptions allow users to process large volumes of files without usage caps on paid plans.
Multiple export formats, including PDF, DOCX, TXT, and SRT, provide flexibility for various use cases.
Fast transcription processes files in seconds, powered by GPU acceleration for rapid turnaround.
Built-in translation transcribes audio directly to English and translates transcripts into over 134 languages.
Audio restoration enhances poor-quality audio files before transcription, improving accuracy.
Batch processing supports up to 50 simultaneous file uploads, streamlining high-volume workflows.
YouTube integration enables direct transcription of videos via URL, simplifying content repurposing.

faqs.question: What is TurboScribe used for?
faqs.answer: TurboScribe transcribes audio and video files into accurate text, ideal for creating transcripts, subtitles, or text-based content for professionals like journalists, podcasters, and educators.

faqs.question: Does TurboScribe offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, TurboScribe provides a free tier with up to three 30-minute transcriptions per day, allowing users to test its features.

faqs.question: What file formats does TurboScribe support?
faqs.answer: TurboScribe supports common formats like MP3, MP4, M4A, MOV, AAC, WAV, OGG, OPUS, MPEG, WMA, and YouTube links.

faqs.question: Can TurboScribe handle multi-speaker audio?
faqs.answer: Yes, its speaker recognition feature identifies and labels different speakers, making it suitable for interviews, meetings, and podcasts.

faqs.question: How accurate is TurboScribeâ€™s transcription?
faqs.answer: TurboScribe achieves 99.8% accuracy using Whisper AI, effectively handling various accents and background noise.

faqs.question: Is TurboScribe secure for sensitive data?
faqs.answer: TurboScribe encrypts all uploaded files and transcripts, allowing users to delete data at any time for enhanced privacy.

faqs.question: Can TurboScribe transcribe and translate simultaneously?
faqs.answer: Yes, it can transcribe audio in any supported language directly to English and translate transcripts into over 134 languages.

faqs.question: What is the maximum file size for transcription?
faqs.answer: TurboScribe supports files up to 10 hours long or 5GB in size, suitable for both short clips and extensive recordings.
